DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect TENS IFC patient non specific chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation Interferential Currents Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Setting Outpatient physiotherapy department university ( Cesumar ) Participants A hundred fifty patient non specific chronic low back pain without radicular pain . Interventions The patient randomly divide three group : 1 ) TENS ; 2 ) IFC ; e 3 ) Control . Ten session electrotherapy group 1 2 , patient Control group stay without treatment period Main Outcome Measures Intensity pain Visual Analogue Scale McGill Pain Questionnaire ; specific functional disability Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire ; Analgesic period ( hour ) ; medication consumption Statistic Analysis All data analyze use Statistica version 7 SAS version 9.1 . Baseline characteristic compare use Shapiro-Wilks test continuous variable analysis variance measure independent data . The characteristic patient finish treatment compare lose patient , use one-way ANOVA Kruskal-Wallis test .
DOC.criteria: Individuals low back pain less three month Individuals receive treatment pain another method time , except medicine ; Pregnant woman ; Patients undergone vertebral column surgery ( less three month time study ) ; Individuals contraindication electrotherapy , skin lesion , abnormal sensitivity , infectious blood disease , heart pacemaker inability answer questionnaire ; Patients fibromyalgia ; Individuals psychiatric problem ; Individuals refuse participate unwilling follow protocol last two week .
